description: Sunset beaches, spice-scented streets and coastal beats - a playlist to wander Kozhikode.

items.name: Pazhassi Raja Museum And Art Gallery – History And Culture
Kozhikode Beach – Stunning Views
items.description: Of all the best beaches Kozhikode is famous for, Calicut beach happens to be an ideal location for tourists who want to unwind themselves from the stress and pollution of the city. If you are keen to discover the river in Kerala, this is one of the perfect places to see in Kozhikode that you need to add to your itinerary. The beach not only offers the best sunrise and sunset views but every year in January, the beach also plays a great host to one of the biggest festivals called the Malabar Mahotsavam.

items.name: Calicut Planetarium – Star Gazing
items.location_hint: JafferKhan Colony, New Bus Stand, Near Bhima Jewellers, Kozhikode, Kerala 673006

items.name: Mishkal Mosque – Beautiful Place Of Worship
Mother Of God Cathedral – Religious Place
Krishna Menon Museum – Artefacts And Art
items.location_hint: Kendriya Vidyalaya Rd, Near Kendriya Vidyalaya, East Hill, Kozhikode, Kerala 673005

items.name: Kozhippara Falls – Mesmerizing Waterfalls
items.description: The stunning Kozhippara Falls is located on the borders of Kakkadampoyli at the district division of Malappuram and Calicut. You will encounter numerous trekking groups here. The serene ambience of these falls enhances the beauty of this place. Whether interested in adventurous excursions such as swimming and trekking or looking forward to witnessing the mystic beauty of Kozhikode, this place will surely surprise you with numerous experiences.

items.name: Thusharagiri Falls – Magnificent Waterfalls
items.description: Thusharagiri waterfall is located in the Western Ghats of Kozhikode district. The place is crowded with numerous visitors throughout the year as the fall cascades down three magnificent waterfalls. Thusharagiri waterfall is located in a small tribal village, sharing the name of the fall. The place is also the hub of trekkers and rock climbers. You can take an interesting trek towards Lakkidi Ghat from here.

items.name: Sweet Street – Sweet Tooth
items.description: Locally known as Mithai Theravu, Sweet Street in Kozhikode is quite popular amongst the tourists and Epicures staying in the town. It is one of the busiest places in Kozhikode and remains open until 9 p.m. With an enormous variety of sweets and other delicacies, this place is truly a retreat for food lovers. If you are looking for places to visit in Calicut at night to satiate your hunger pangs, Sweet Street is the best options.

items.name: Elathur – Vacationing Destination
items.description: Elathur is a serene village located in Kozhikode and is surrounded by a lake on one side and a river on the other. This mesmerizing location is a paradise for seafood lovers as it offers a vast variety of scrumptious delicacies to its guests. If you are interested in spending some peaceful hours while vacationing in Kozhikode then head to this beautiful and isolated village offering an entirely unique experience.

items.name: Sargaalaya Kerala Arts – Stunning Backwaters
items.description: If you are interested in witnessing the true art and culture of Kerala while holidaying in Kozhikode then do plan a visit to Sargaalaya Kerala Arts. It is an amazing initiative by the Department of Tourism, Kerala to preserve and spread awareness about the rich art and culture of Kerala. Located near the stunning backwaters of Iringal in Kozhikode district, the place is a delightful retreat for art-lovers staying in Kozhikode.

items.name: Azhakodi Devi Temple – House Of Worship
items.location_hint: Azhakodi Devi Temple Road, Azhakodi Nagar, Thiruthiyad, Kozhikode, Kerala

items.name: Valayanad Temple – Stunning Architecture
items.location_hint: Valayanad Temple Rd, Govindapuram, Kozhikode, Kerala
